description.value: Your fan can stir up even more powerful winds. You can Activate your tengu feather fan one additional time per day. Add the 3rd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wall of Wind]{Wall of Wind} spell to the spells contained within your fan. @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:air,evocation,item:trait:spell,primal]{Fortitude saving throw}
